question: This man gave a record 25 hour speech in the US Senate criticizing the Trump administration. This politician, known for his advocacy for social justice and criminal justice reform, served as the 38th Mayor of Newark, New Jersey, from 2006 to 2013. He gained national attention for his innovative use of social media to connect with constituents and address community issues. He is a Rhodes Scholar and a graduate of Yale Law School. Who is this current U.S. Senator from New Jersey?

President Donald Trump announced a 46% tariff on goods from this nation, a manufacturing hub for US companies including Nike. This Southeast Asian country, known for its vibrant street food and its bustling cities, is home to Ha Long Bay, a UNESCO World Heritage Site featuring thousands of limestone islands and islets. Its capital, Hanoi, boasts a rich history and French colonial architecture. It is a major exporter of rice, coffee, and seafood. What is the name of this country, bordered by China, Laos, and Cambodia?

Susan Crawford defeated Brad Schimel who was backed by more than $20 million in donations from Elon Musk in a judicial election in this US state. The state, known as "America's Dairyland," is a leading producer of cheese and other dairy products. It's also home to the iconic Harley-Davidson motorcycle company, headquartered in Milwaukee. Its largest city, Milwaukee, is famous for its brewing history. What is the name of this state, bordered by two Great Lakes and known for its cheeseheads?

This stock index dropped more than 10% on April 3 and 4, 2025 after President Trump announced tariffs on what he called "Liberation Day". This stock market index, widely regarded as a benchmark for the overall health of the U.S. economy, tracks the performance of 500 large-cap companies listed on the stock exchanges in the United States. Its components are selected by a committee that aims to represent the leading companies in leading industries of the U.S. economy. It is a market-capitalization-weighted index, meaning that companies with larger market caps have a greater influence on its value. What is the name of this stock market index?

Marine Le Pen was recently convicted of embezzlement in this nation where she was leading in presidential polls. This European country, known for its haute cuisine and its rich artistic heritage, is home to the Louvre Museum, one of the world's largest and most visited art museums. Its capital city, Paris, is renowned for its iconic Eiffel Tower and its romantic atmosphere. It is also famous for its fashion industry and its influence on global trends. What is the name of this country, where the French language is spoken?
